resources.string:
Simple app to force set refresh rate. Thanks to Max Weinbach for finding this tweak and Rohit Shetty (TechyLogy YT) for testing this app.
Developed by @SatySatsZB #hex_ installer


This app also includes QS tiles for changing the refresh rates. Check in your QuickSettings Panel
You can confirm the current FPS on the top right corner of this app.
